Whiskey Balvenie Doublewood 17 Years Old

Single Malt Scotch Whiskey Balveny Doublewood 17 Rocks.

For the taste of Balvenya Double Wood 17 is also licorice. Malt spices are added to dried fruits, apple pie and smeared with almonds.

Notes of toffee, vanilla tones and oak give the opportunity to see barvy and old song.
